item.title: Big Trak Jr and Raspberry Pi - part 1
item.description: Browsing around the Modelzone shop in Westfields today I saw that the Big Trak Jr was on sale for Â£9.99. I’ve been watching these for a while but thought they were a bit too much for me to just take apart, but at the sale price I picked one up. As soon as I got back home I put some batteries in, had a play with it and then promptly began dissassembling it.
